thread.title: 'Doctor Strange': Proof Benedict Cumberbatch and Chris Hemsworth Laid on the Charm Filming Together
thread.title_full: 'Doctor Strange': Proof Benedict Cumberbatch and Chris Hemsworth Laid on the Charm Filming Together

title: 'Doctor Strange': Proof Benedict Cumberbatch and Chris Hemsworth Laid on the Charm Filming Together
text:
1:30pm PT by Aaron Couch 'Doctor Strange': Proof Benedict Cumberbatch and Chris Hemsworth Laid on the Charm Filming Together Courtesy of Marvel Studios A behind-the-scenes featurette shows why the Sorcerer Supreme is likely Thor's new favorite superhero. 
It turns out the God of Thunder meeting the Sorcerer Supreme was as charming behind-the-scenes as it as on the big screen. 
Benedict Cumberbatch (Doctor Strange) and Chris Hemsworth (Thor) are seen palling around in a featurette tied to Tuesday's Doctor Strange home entertainment release. In addition to showcasing the actors' charm, it delves into the back story of the end tag scene that showed the two together. 
"Late into the shooting of Strange , the Thor: Ragnarok script was coming together, and as we were reading it, we said, this scene could be hilarious. Wouldn't it be funny and answer the question right away, what's it going be like when Doctor Strange enters the Marvel Universe," executive producer Stephen Broussard says in the video. 
The scene in question made its way into Doctor Strange , showing the sorcerer providing Thor with an endless glass of beer, and thus surely making him the God of Thunder's new favorite superhero. 
There will be more of them together in Thor: Ragnarok , which hits theaters Nov. 3. God of Thunder meets Sorcerer Supreme. Bring home #DoctorStrange tomorrow on Digital HD. pic.twitter.com/OLcc7Z2w0B â€” Chris Hemsworth (@chrishemsworth) February 13, 2017 Aaron Couch
